PropertyValue.Value: select basi_tick_mana_type_info.tick_mana_type,basi_tick_mana_type_info.tick_mana_type_name,decode(basi_tick_mana_type_info.ticket_phy_type,'01','Token票','02','一卡通卡','03','CPU票卡','未知票卡') as ticket_phy_type,basi_tick_mana_type_info.ticket_phy_type_name,basi_tick_mana_type_info.ticket_family_type,basi_tick_mana_type_info.ticket_family_type_name,decode(basi_tick_mana_type_info.card_issue_id,'1','ACC','99','一卡通') as card_issue_id from basi_tick_mana_type_info
